CustomField.description: TRUE if Status from NetSuite <> Expected Status in Salesforce
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "--None--"), FALSE, IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Open"), CONTAINS( "paid in full;credited in full;paid but partially credited", LOWER(Invoice_Status__c) ), CONTAINS( "open;partially paid;partially credited", LOWER(Invoice_Status__c) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status Mismatch
